channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins JX Resources Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins JX Resources Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10339|2024-08-04T22:17:20.384Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jx%20resources%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins JX Resources Plugin 1.0.36 and earlier in GlobalPluginConfiguration#doValidateClient allowed users with Overall/Read access to have Jenkins connect to an attacker-specified Kubernetes server, potentially leaking credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-10338|2024-08-04T22:17:20.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jx%20resources%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins JX Resources Plugin 1.0.36 and earlier in GlobalPluginConfiguration#doValidateClient allowed attackers to have Jenkins connect to an attacker-specified Kubernetes server, potentially leaking credentials.
